Welcome to the vintage-inspired word game

You can play without an account or you can create an account and enjoy a leveling system that gives you a title based on your knowledge, revisit all the words you have solved before, compete with the top 5 players in the game and never have to solve the same word twice.

- Only your first and last name

- Your username must be 6-12 characters long and it can only consist of alphanumeric characters

- Your password must be 8-20 characters long
